column1: Coronavirus: 'Dangerous moment' as UK lockdown eases

"Because [#COVID19] is fairly new to #medicine, #researchers are still tabulating the #data required to calculate #R0 more or less in real time. As of February 19, 2020, estimates placed R0 above 1.4 but below 4, well within the range for other #coronaviruses like #SARS."
